page.title: 16Shopping-South Washington.
page.content: {The villages of Washington}all have their own{shopping areas.}Ayton is typical of one of these centres. {Marie Smith reports:-} There are three different kinds of shops.The V.G has most of the food and drink that we like.The newsagent has papers,wool,comics,pop and toys.Next is a take-away selling Chinese food and fish'n'chips.If the things we need are not there we go to the town centre to{The Galleries.}Here they sell furniture,clothes,and shoes.There are hairdressers,chemists,jewellers and cafes.To get to The Galleries is a five minute bus ride.If you were old you might buy all your things from the local shops but The Galleries are cheaper and better.In a little shop you have to put on higher prices so that you can buy more stock. The Galleries also have a better choice.
